entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:25 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -27.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 71 %

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
